entries.info: index of the hit in the specific detector bank
entries.name: index

entries.info: row number in the particle bank hit is associated with
entries.name: pindex

entries.info: Detector ID, as defined in org.jlab.detector.base.DetectorType
entries.name: detector

entries.info: Sector of the Detector hit
entries.name: sector

entries.info: Layer ID, as defined in org.jlab.detector.base.DetectorLayer
entries.name: layer

entries.info: Energy associated with the hit (GeV)
entries.name: energy

entries.info: Time associated with the hit (ns)
entries.name: time

entries.info: Path from vertex to the hit position (cm)
entries.name: path

entries.info: Chi2 (or quality) of hit-track matching
entries.name: chi2

entries.info: X coordinate of the hit (cm)
entries.name: x

entries.info: Y coordinate of the hit (cm)
entries.name: y

entries.info: Z coordinate of the hit (cm)
entries.name: z

entries.info: X coordinate of the matched hit (cm)
entries.name: hx

entries.info: Y coordinate of the mathced hit (cm)
entries.name: hy

entries.info: Z coordinate of the matched hit (cm)
entries.name: hz

entries.info: distance on U-side
entries.name: lu

entries.info: distance on V-side
entries.name: lv

entries.info: distance on W-side
entries.name: lw

entries.info: shower width on U-side
entries.name: du

entries.info: shower width on V-side
entries.name: dv

entries.info: shower width on w-side
entries.name: dw

entries.info: 2nd moment of the shower on U-side
entries.name: m2u

entries.info: 2nd moment of the shower on V-side
entries.name: m2v

entries.info: 2nd moment of the shower on W-side
entries.name: m2w

entries.info: 3rd moment of the shower on U-side
entries.name: m3u

entries.info: 3rd moment of the shower on V-side
entries.name: m3v

entries.info: 3rd moment of the shower on W-side
entries.name: m3w

entries.info: hit status
entries.name: status
